data.text: @polerix @CBCNB I prefer free choice in a free country.  If you want to live in fear have fun.  An article out of the US Ã  few months ago, indicated that you have a better chance of being killed by lightening than covid to put it in perspective
@cgbrads @Jean18538839 @CBCNB Then you probably shouldn't have been going anyway, before covid, with vax pass or now.  The risk of catching something has always been there and always will be.

@CBCNB This article is a perfect example of how gullible people are.  ICU cases increased, but ICU occupancy rate decreased.  It is time to quit reporting on covid all together and let us get on with normal life!
@CBCNB But Higgs says COVID is over?
